heisigStory: "Behind every successful person lies a woman...," who usually turns out to be one's mama!
koohiiStory1: Freud believed every man wants to lie down with his mother.
koohiiStory2: Who does every person want to lie down with? Yo´ MAMA!
words:
毎(ごと): each respectively
毎度(まいど): each time, common service-sector greeting
毎朝(まいあさ): every morning
毎月(まいげつ): every month, each month, monthly
毎週(まいしゅう): every week
毎日(まいにち): every day
毎晩(まいばん): every night
